OUR SERVCIES

We Specialize In

Digital Billboard Advertisement

Let your creativity come to life on our High Definition LED P6 outdoor digital billboards, an effective outdoor advertising solution with low costs available in high impact locations. Our digital billboards are fitted with screens with dual side displays for 24/7 visibility.

Customized Stickers on Taxi

We are involved in offering Taxicab Advertisement to the clients. It gives the freedom to promote brands on a widespread area. Transport vehicle is the best means to spread awareness as these are moving around in the city for most of the time. Quality material is used in making these advertisements. This medium of advertisement is very popular among the people.

Webpage Designing & Hosting

A website provides another avenue for customers and prospects to find your company. We help you create a site that works and provide a space for you to conduct your business online and stay live 24/7.

Social Media Promotion

Social media marketing is a powerful way for businesses of all sizes to reach prospects and customers. If your business is not leveraging social media marketing, your business is not maximizing its revenues. We help you reach your customers through promotion in different social media plaforms.

Ad Making

We do whatever it takes to share your story. That means doing so much more than just filming and editing. We’re continuously learning about psychology and how to motivate behaviour. We’re exploring digital strategies that can get you triple digit returns on your marketing spend. We’re finding new ways of shooting and editing to stay at the forefront of the best video techniques and practices in our industry. Our goal is to help spread your story as far and wide as possible by being involved in the entire process.

Taxi TV Advertisement

Proudly presenting you, Nepal’s 1st innovative and futuristic way of advertising. Taxi TV advertising can be the best advertising platform for this modern era of technology, which makes your brand and services more prominent and renowned. We offer a number of expert services with regards to the Taxi like:

  • 1. GPS tracing system for your Ads.
  • 2. Records feedbacks from your potential clients.
  • 3. Personal access to our portal for supervision.
  • 4. Wide range of reach, frequency and low Per Person Impressions.
  • 5. High conversation rate and higher Return on Investments (ROI).
